title: Teamspeak Free to use oceteamspeak.com
body:
hello OCE,

Myself and another guy have setup a TeamSpeak server for OCE with **1000 slots in it**.
Also will be hosting teamspeak chats for worlds!!! 
We aim to become a free/non probable community and want the a huge community running. 
feel free to use the TeamSpeak for ranked 5s although we do suggest msging an admin to set up a lock channel for you :D

We have set it up so there are heaps of rooms a channel where people can go to find players for normal's and we also set up channels for ranked duo according to the rank :D

What we can offer, a channel with a password for you and your friends where you can't be bothered by the trolls.

TeamSpeak: oceteamspeak.com
Website: oceteamspeak.com

replies.body: Today I logged into the teamspeak at 2 am. I sensed a lot of autism. I felt right at home :)

> [{quoted}](name=Anastice,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uvNAka7o,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-09-24T16:16:32.409+0000)
>
> Today I logged into the teamspeak at 2 am. I sensed a lot of autism. I felt right at home :)

that's how we roll
was chatting with them today awesome bunch of dudes!!

> [{quoted}](name=ISeeYouPee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=uvNAka7o,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-09-24T15:10:18.350+0000)
>
> was chatting with them today awesome bunch of dudes!!

:D
This max guy sounds really cool.

great server cool dudes
Edit: some of you may have seen me Jasterfarian/scrublord come say hi sometime eh?
2 Randoms approached me and started talking to me. Overall 10/10 experience.

Seems like a great idea. While playing with friends and communicating on teamspeak and then casually join a different lobby and meet new players on teamspeak while watching the Worlds. Keen on joining this teamspeak channel. 

See you guys there.
This is a pretty good idea, great way to communicate with a team
